name: Retrofit in self-build: best practice pointers
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Refurbishing Britain's existing housing stock is an important step towards meeting carbon emission targets - but will also play a significant role in reducing household energy bills. This session provides some case study examples of best practice and shares solutions to a variety of common problems in Britain's ageing housing stock.
